details.description: Get an estimate of how much Pension Credit you may be entitled to
details.more_information:
It will give you an idea of how much Pension Credit you could get.

You can’t use this calculator if:

  • you live in a care home - contact the Pension Credit application line on 0800 99 1234
  • you or your partner are deferring your State Pension - contact your pension centre on 0845 60 60 265

If you’ve not reached the Pension Credit qualifying age, enter ‘1 January 1950’ as your date of birth on step 2 of the calculator.
